#summary Describes the database structure

===vsf_user===
||  id            || integer || primary key               || Unique ID                ||
||  name          || text    || unique not null           || Unique name              ||
||  password      || text    || null                      || Password (MD5 hash)      ||
||  enabled       || integer || not null default 1        || Account enabled          ||
||  ul_price      || double  || not null default 0.0      || Upload reward credit/mb  ||
||  dl_price      || double  || not null default 0.0      || Download cost credit/mb  ||
||  c_time        || text    || default current_timestamp || Creation time            ||
||  c_user        || text    || default 'system'          || Creator                  ||
||  m_time        || text    || default current_timestamp || Modification time        ||
||  m_user        || text    || null                      || Changer                  ||
||  last_login    || text    || null                      || Last login time          ||


===vsf_ipmask===
||  id           || integer  || primary key               || Unique ID                ||
||  user_id      || integer  || not null                  || User ID (FK)             ||
||  mask         || text     || not null                  || IP mask (e.g. 127.0.0.*) ||
||  ident        || text     || null                      || Ident name               ||
